			ideology=stalinism

			}
		}
		field_marshal = { #only good choices
			visible = {
				has_government = communism
			}
			traits = { politically_connected old_guard }

			attack_skill = 1

				NOT = {
					is_in_faction_with = SOV

	TAN_democratic_guy={
		advisor={
			slot = political_advisor
			idea_token = TAN_democratic_guy
			allowed  = {
				original_tag  = TAN
			}
			traits  = {
				democratic_reformer 
			}
			do_effect  = {
				not  = {
					has_government  = democratic 
				}
			}
			ai_will_do = {
				factor = 0
				modifier = {
					has_idea = GEN_Strenghten_Democracy_I
					NOT = {
						OR = {
							AND = {
								is_puppet = yes
								NOT = {
									has_government = democratic
								}
							}
							democratic > 0.7
							democratic < 0.15
						}							
					}
					add = 20		
				}
			}
		}
# TODO[ PORTRAIT LARGE ]: Missing large portrait please check!
		portraits={
			army={
				small="GFX_idea_generic_political_advisor_asia_1"
			}
		}
	}
	TAN_communist_guy={
		advisor={
			slot = political_advisor
			idea_token = TAN_communist_guy
			allowed  = {
					original_tag  = TAN
				}
				traits  = {
					communist_revolutionary 
				}
				do_effect  = {
					not  = {
						has_government  = communism 
					}
				}
				available = {
					if = {
						limit = { has_dlc = "Man the Guns" }	
						NOT = { has_autonomy_state = autonomy_supervised_state }
					}
				}
					
				traits = { communist_revolutionary }
				ai_will_do = {
					factor = 0
					modifier = {
						has_idea = internationalism
						NOT = {
							OR = {
								AND = {
									is_puppet = yes
									NOT = {
										has_government = communism
									}
								}
								communism > 0.7
								communism < 0.15
							}						
						}
						add = 20
					}				
				}
		}
# TODO[ PORTRAIT LARGE ]: Missing large portrait please check!
		portraits={
			army={
				small="GFX_idea_generic_political_advisor_asia_3"
			}
		}
	}
	TAN_fascist_guy={
		advisor={
			slot = political_advisor
			idea_token = TAN_fascist_guy
			allowed  = {
				original_tag  = TAN
			}
			available = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_dlc = "Man the Guns" }	
					NOT = { has_autonomy_state = autonomy_supervised_state }
				}									
			}

			visible = {
				
			}

			traits = { fascist_demagogue }

			ai_will_do = {
				factor = 0
				modifier = {
					OR = {
						has_idea = nationalism
					}
					
					NOT = {
						OR = {
							AND = {
								is_puppet = yes
								NOT = {
									has_government = fascism
								}
							}
							fascism > 0.7
							fascism < 0.15
						}						
					}
					add = 20
				}
			}
		}
# TODO[ PORTRAIT LARGE ]: Missing large portrait please check!

			army={
				small="GFX_idea_generic_political_advisor_asia_2"
